title: Hiroki Shinjo
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Shinjo was born in <a href="Kunitachi%2C%20Tokyo">Kunitachi</a> on April 28, 1973. After graduating from <a href="Chuo%20University">Chuo University</a>, he joined <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a> club <a href="FC%20Tokyo">Tokyo Gas</a> (later "FC Tokyo") in 1996. He became a regular player as right side back from first season. From 1997, he was converted to defensive midfielder and played many matches for the position with <a href="Satoru%20Asari">Satoru Asari</a>. The club results rose year by year and won the champions in <a href="1998%20Japan%20Football%20League">1998</a>. The club was promoted to new league <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> from 1999. However his opportunity to play decreased in 1999. Although the club won the 2nd place in 1999 and was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> from 2000, he retired end of 1999 season without playing J1.
